018package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.spi;
019
020import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNull;
023
024import javax.script.AbstractScriptEngine;
025import javax.script.Bindings;
026import javax.script.ScriptEngineFactory;
027import javax.script.ScriptException;
028import javax.script.SimpleBindings;
029import java.io.BufferedReader;
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.io.Reader;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035
036/**
037 *  This class is meant as a base class for a concrete implementation of a
038 *  script engine. Based on
039 *  {@link AbstractScriptEngine}
040 *  it will provide some additional methods for convenience.
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: ScriptEngineBase.java 878 2021-02-20 19:56:13Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.0.5
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ScriptEngineBase.java 878 2021-02-20 19:56:13Z tquadrat $" )
049@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
050public abstract class ScriptEngineBase extends AbstractScriptEngine
051{
052        /*-----------*\
053    ====** Constants **========================================================
054        \*-----------*/
055    /**
056     *  The name for the variable that holds the command line arguments:
057     *  {@value}.
058     */
059    public static final String ARGUMENTS = "arguments";
060
061        /*------------*\
062    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
063        \*------------*/
064    /**
065     *  The factory that created this engine; may be {@code null}
066     */
067    private volatile ScriptEngineFactory m_EngineFactory;
068
069        /*--------------*\
070    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
071        \*--------------*/
072    /**
073     *  Creates a new {@code ScriptEngineBase} instance.
074     */
075    protected ScriptEngineBase() { this( null ); }
076
077    /**
078     *  Creates a new {@code ScriptEngineBase} instance.
079     *
080     *  @param  factory The reference to the engine factory; may be
081     *      {@code null}.
082     */
083    protected ScriptEngineBase( final ScriptEngineFactory factory )
084    {
085        m_EngineFactory = factory;
086    }   //  ScriptEngineBase()
087
088        /*---------*\
089    ====** Methods **==========================================================
090        \*---------*/
091    /**
092     *  {@inheritDoc}
093     *
094     *  @see javax.script.ScriptEngine#createBindings()
095     */
096    @Override
097    public Bindings createBindings() { return new SimpleBindings(); }
098
099    /**
100     *  {@inheritDoc}
101     *
102     *  @see javax.script.ScriptEngine#getFactory()
103     */
104    @Override
105    public synchronized ScriptEngineFactory getFactory() { return m_EngineFactory; }
106
107    /**
108     *  Reads the complete contents from a
109     *  {@link Reader}
110     *  into a String.
111     *
112     *  @param  reader  The reader
113     *  @return The resulting String.
114     *  @throws ScriptException Problems with reading from the reader.
115     */
116    protected static final String readToString( final Reader reader ) throws ScriptException
117    {
118        final String retValue;
119        try( final var r = new BufferedReader( requireNonNull( reader, "reader" ) ) )
120        {
121            retValue = r.lines()
122                .collect( joining( "\n" ) );
123        }
124        catch( final IOException e )
125        {
126            throw new ScriptException( e );
127        }
128
129        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
130        return retValue;
131    }   //  readToString()
132
133    /**
134     *  Sets a new script factory.
135     *
136     *  @param  factory The new factory; can be {@code null}.
137     */
138    public final synchronized void setFactory( final ScriptEngineFactory factory ) { m_EngineFactory = factory; }
139}
140//  class ScriptEngineBase
141
142/*
143 *  End of File
144 */
